div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 301 Messenia ?, before 1937 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (Oeconomides, Pi- card) Contents: 167 AR, 13 AE Aetolia: 1 triob. Chalcis: 2 dr. Sicyon: 13 triob.; 1 AE Patrae: 6 triob. Achaean League: 133 triob.; 1 AE Messenia: 7 AE Lacedaemon: 2 triob. Argos: 2 triob. Methana: 1 AE Epidaurus: 1 AE Megalopolis: 8 triob. Cleitor: 1 AE Tegea: 1 AE Disposition: Athens BCH 1937, p. 443 Additional information from M. Oeconomides See no. 260 above
